Package renderer

Class Render

java.lang.Object
renderer.Render
public class Render
extends java.lang.Object
class Render, responsible to take all the calculation of ray intersections and light, and to create a picture from that.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private ImageWriter imageWriter  
    private static int MAX_CALC_COLOR_LEVEL  
    private static double MIN_CALC_COLOR_K  
    private Scene scene
    scene - stores all the scene components imageWriter - save the picture and project path and the pixels matrix

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Render​(ImageWriter imageWriter, Scene scene)
    constructor to initialized class Render

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint intersection, Ray r)
    function to calculate the color for the closes point to the ray
    private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint gp, Ray ray, int level, double k)
    function to calculate the color
    private Color calcDiffusive​(double kd, Vector l, Vector n, Color lightIntensity)
    function to evaluate the diffusive factor of the light, according to "Phong model" the diffusive factor represent the light reflected from the object to everywhere (in 180 degree from the point of the intersection between object and source light ray).
    private Color calcSpecular​(double ks, Vector l, Vector n, Vector v, int nShininess, Color lightIntensity)
    function to evaluate the specular factor of the light, according to "Phong model", is the direct light that is reflected from the object.
    Ray constructReflectedRay​(Vector n, Point3D point3D, Ray r)
    function to evaluate the reflected ray from the object, (Mirror)
    private Ray constructRefractedRay​(Vector n, Point3D point, Ray r)
    function to evaluate the "Refracted Ray" - the ray that goes into the object, and move a little bit.
    private Intersectable.GeoPoint findCLosestIntersection​(Ray ray)
    the function find all the intersection of a given ray, and also the closest point to that given ray.
    private Intersectable.GeoPoint getClosesPoint​(Ray ray, java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> intersectionsPoints)
    function receive some points, and return the point with the minimal distance from the ray
    void printGrid​(int interval, java.awt.Color color)
    function to print grid into the scene, to make sure everything is in the right place
    void renderImage()
    this function responsible for fill up the pixels matrix from the scene, it receive from the scene the colors for each pixel and fill the matrix in the image writer
    private double transparency​(LightSource ls, Vector l, Vector n, Intersectable.GeoPoint geopoint)
    function to evaluate the factor of the all the reflection on the object, we take all the glasses that the original ray move through it and evaluate the effect on the pixel.
    private boolean unshaded​(LightSource light, Vector l, Vector n, Intersectable.GeoPoint geopoint)
    function to check if the original ray is moving through any object, that will make a shadow on another object.
    void writeToImage()
    write the details of the scene, by calling the function from Image Writer class

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Render

      public Render​(ImageWriter imageWriter, Scene scene)
      constructor to initialized class Render
      Parameters:
      imageWriter - use imageWriter class to write the picture
      scene - take from the scene all the details

  • Method Details

    • renderImage

      public void renderImage()
      this function responsible for fill up the pixels matrix from the scene, it receive from the scene the colors for each pixel and fill the matrix in the image writer

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint intersection, Ray r)
      function to calculate the color for the closes point to the ray
      Parameters:
      intersection - point, for calculating the color

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint gp, Ray ray, int level, double k)
      function to calculate the color
      Parameters:
      gp - geo point
      ray - ray
      Returns:
      sum of the colors

    • calcDiffusive

      private Color calcDiffusive​(double kd, Vector l, Vector n, Color lightIntensity)
      function to evaluate the diffusive factor of the light, according to "Phong model" the diffusive factor represent the light reflected from the object to everywhere (in 180 degree from the point of the intersection between object and source light ray).
      Parameters:
      kd - the brightness
      l - vector from the light to the object.
      n - vector normal to the object.
      lightIntensity - the intensity of the light.
      Returns:
      the diffusive color

    • calcSpecular

      private Color calcSpecular​(double ks, Vector l, Vector n, Vector v, int nShininess, Color lightIntensity)
      function to evaluate the specular factor of the light, according to "Phong model", is the direct light that is reflected from the object.
      Parameters:
      ks - factor of the diffusive component
      l - vector from the light to the object.
      n - vector normal to the object.
      v - the vector reflected from the object.
      nShininess - the object shininess.
      lightIntensity - the intensity of the light.
      Returns:
      the specular color

    • getClosesPoint

      private Intersectable.GeoPoint getClosesPoint​(Ray ray, java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> intersectionsPoints)
      function receive some points, and return the point with the minimal distance from the ray
      Parameters:
      intersectionsPoints - several points
      Returns:
      the closest point to the ray

    • printGrid

      public void printGrid​(int interval, java.awt.Color color)
      function to print grid into the scene, to make sure everything is in the right place
      Parameters:
      interval - size
      color - color of the grid

    • writeToImage

      public void writeToImage()
      write the details of the scene, by calling the function from Image Writer class

    • unshaded

      private boolean unshaded​(LightSource light, Vector l, Vector n, Intersectable.GeoPoint geopoint)
      function to check if the original ray is moving through any object, that will make a shadow on another object.
      Parameters:
      light - the light on the object.
      l - vector to the object from the camera through the "glass"
      n - normal to the object.
      geopoint - point on the object.
      Returns:
      if there is a shadow or not.

    • transparency

      private double transparency​(LightSource ls, Vector l, Vector n, Intersectable.GeoPoint geopoint)
      function to evaluate the factor of the all the reflection on the object, we take all the glasses that the original ray move through it and evaluate the effect on the pixel.
      Parameters:
      ls - the light through the "glass"
      l - vector of the light
      n - normal to the object
      geopoint - point on the object
      Returns:
      transparency factor of all the "glasses" together.

    • constructRefractedRay

      private Ray constructRefractedRay​(Vector n, Point3D point, Ray r)
      function to evaluate the "Refracted Ray" - the ray that goes into the object, and move a little bit. (for example: straw inside glass of water)
      Parameters:
      point - the intersection of the ray with the object.
      r - the original ray from the camera.
      Returns:
      the resulted ray, after the calculation.

    • constructReflectedRay

      public Ray constructReflectedRay​(Vector n, Point3D point3D, Ray r)
      function to evaluate the reflected ray from the object, (Mirror)
      Parameters:
      n - vector normal for calculation
      point3D - the intersection point on the object.
      r - the original ray, from the camera to the object.
      Returns:
      ray reflected to the original ray.

    • findCLosestIntersection

      private Intersectable.GeoPoint findCLosestIntersection​(Ray ray)
      the function find all the intersection of a given ray, and also the closest point to that given ray. it doing the job of two given function: 1) get closest point, 2) find all intersection.
      Parameters:
      ray - receive a ray to check all the intersection with the geometries objects.
      Returns:
      point that is the closest intersection to the geometries.
